Name: Of Fields Green: Border of Dreams
Desc: The main gate of the garden known as "Of Fields Green." It is made from a verdant shrub arch adorned with vibrant flowers and topped with a cute pair of ears.\n"Of Fields Green" draws inspiration from wonderlands in fairy tales. Passing through this arch is like walking into childhood dreams, and is an invitation to forget all your worries and just bask in the beauty of this scenery.
